homePage.welcome_text: Istifham Company is a Saudi company established in the UAE that aims to improve and enhance the quality of an individual's life management through purposeful and constructive listening and limited interaction in selected moments that enrich the experience.
homePage.freeTrailText: The free trial is a mandatory procedure before booking, as each customer is entitled to only one free trial. We hope to be an enjoyable part of your journey through life.
homePage.reservationText: Because you have already tried the free trial, you are now confident about this booking process. And because we trust what we offer, the booking amount is non-refundable and we will make sure to be an enjoyable part of your life journey.

about-us.title: About us
about-us.who-are-usText: Istifham is a company that aims to improve and enhance the quality of life management through purposeful and constructive listening and limited interaction at selected moments that enrich the experience, without providing any type of medical, psychological, legal, or financial advice. This activity is not practiced in an official headquarters, but rather is provided electronically or in a selected public place that is consistent with the nature of the activity.
about-us.our-messageText: Self-management becomes effective , meaningful , and a more balanced way of life , which is reflected in the family, then work, and then society.
about-us.why-usText: Because after listening to you, we don't begin with the answer, but rather with the question: Why? And from here begins our journey together to discover your ability to manage your life for the better in a calm and comfortable environment.
about-us.what-we-doText: Listening experience via call or meeting in a selected public place that matches the nature of the activity.

terms_conditions.term1: Istifham is committed to providing a respectful and safe environment for both its employees and customers. Any inappropriate behavior is strictly prohibited. Should this occur , Istifham reserves the right to : immediately terminate the transaction and refuse any future dealings with that customer .
terms_conditions.term2: All information provided by the customer is treated with the strictest confidence , as part of our commitment to integrity , respect for privacy , and non-disclosure of any information with any third party .

rules.rule1: The amount to be paid is non-refundable , so we have provided you with a free trial period sufficient to ensure you are confident before booking and paying with us .
rules.rule2: If the customer is late for the scheduled appointment , the delay will be counted as part of the booking period .
rules.rule3: If the customer does not show up for the appointment, another alternative appointment will be booked for them for one time , If they do not show up , they will not be rebooked to avoid reserving a time slot that was supposed to be a paid reservation for someone else .
rules.rule4: If the appointment is changed , it will be for a one-time rescheduling , If they do not show up, they will not be rebooked to avoid reserving a time slot that was supposed to be a paid reservation for someone else .
rules.rule5: The listening experience will be provided via Google Meet through a link that will be sent via email prior to the booking date .
rules.rule6: The listening and meeting experience will be conducted via the location chosen by istifham Company , so the meeting location sent via email may be far from the customer's location .
